pre_caption: The video begins with a view of a street intersection with traffic lights and a crosswalk in the foreground. The camera pans to the right, revealing more of the intersection and the surrounding area, including trees, buildings, and a few pedestrians walking on the sidewalk. A car is seen approaching the intersection from the right side of the frame, moving towards the center of the intersection. The car continues to move forward, getting closer to the center of the intersection. The car stops at the intersection, waiting for the traffic light to change.
